BIO

My name is Ratko Kovačević. From the moment I produced "Hello World" in the console of my first application, I knew that I was involved in the world of web development. But web development has never been "just a job" for me, it offers a dedicated challenge to constantly learning and improving my skills in creating quality web app. What started with a simple "Hello World" has become a full-fledged passion that is getting more and more exciting over the years.
